Rangiora High School shuts amid Covid-19 outbreak, nearly 50 staff experience symptoms following teacher-only day https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/rangiora-high-school-shuts-amid-covid-19-outbreak-nearly-50-staff-experience-symptoms-following-teacher-only-day/TYNMTUGCYNEK7M4LPLU5PE7YG4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/rangiora-high-school-shuts-amid-covid-19-outbreak-nearly-50-staff-experience-symptoms-following-teacher-only-day/TYNMTUGCYNEK7M4LPLU5PE7YG4/ Benjamin PlummerIt comes as about 39 teachers and 10 support staff have contracted Covid-19.
